verses.name: Hebrews 13:15
verses.text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.

verses.name: Hebrews 13:16
verses.text: But to do good and to communicate forget not: for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.

verses.name: Hebrews 13:17
verses.text: Obey them that have the rule over you, and submit yourselves: for they watch for your souls, as they that must give account, that they may do it with joy, and not with grief: for that is unprofitable for you.

verses.name: Hebrews 13:18
verses.text: Pray for us: for we trust we have a good conscience, in all things willing to live honestly.
